section.p: "Information about the actual consumption of medication by a patient. While is generally only relevant for hospital/institutional systems which track individual administrations, it could also be used in ambulatory care e.g. home-health environments which capture administrations such as insulin injections and which use messaging to communicate the information back to a central source; recording immunizations." (HL7 Version 3)
